alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 10:36AM MST until February 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Isolated higher snow totals expected under intense snow bands this evening. Winds gusts to 45 mph. Low visibility in blowing snow, and slick roads are expected. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
